title: Graph
description: A data structure consisting of a set of nodes (or vertices) and a set of edges that establish relationships between the nodes.

title: Node
description: A fundamental unit of a graph that represents an entity or concept.

title: Edge
description: A connection between two nodes in a graph, representing a relationship.

title: OH-EX-001: Example Verification Protocol
description: Before displaying data, first verify its source and structure to ensure integrity.

description.Principle: Complex data should be broken down for clarity.
